SearchReplaceCoder_editFilesToMeetRequir.name: SearchReplaceCoder_editFilesToMeetRequirements
SearchReplaceCoder_editFilesToMeetRequir.description:
Makes the changes to the project files to meet the task requirements using search/replace blocks.
Max attempts for the LLM to generate valid and applicable edits is 5.

parameters.name: requirements
parameters.description: The complete task requirements with all supporting documentation and code samples.

parameters.name: filesToEdit
parameters.description: Relative paths of files that can be edited. These will be included in the chat context.

parameters.name: readOnlyFiles
parameters.description: Relative paths of files to be used as read-only context.

parameters.name: autoCommit
parameters.description: Whether to commit the changes automatically after applying them.

parameters.name: dirtyCommits
parameters.description: If files which have uncommitted changes should be committed before applying changes.
